But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness.
No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful.

item.title: New York
item.dc:creator: credev81
item.content:encoded:
Li Europan lingues es membres del sam familie. Lor separat existentie es un myth. Por scientie, musica, sport etc, litot Europa usa li sam vocabular.
Li lingues differe solmen in li grammatica, li pronunciation e li plu commun vocabules. Omnicos directe al desirabilite de un nov lingua franca: On refusa continuar payar custosi traductores.
At solmen va esser necessi far uniform grammatica, pronunciation e plu sommun paroles. Ma quande lingues coalesce, li grammatica del resultant lingue es plu simplic e regulari quam ti del coalescent lingues. Li nov lingua franca va esser plu simplic e regulari quam li existent Europan

item.content:encoded:
Li Europan lingues es membres del sam familie. Lor separat existentie es un myth. Por scientie, musica, sport etc, litot Europa usa li sam vocabular.
Li lingues differe solmen in li grammatica, li pronunciation e li plu commun vocabules. Omnicos directe al desirabilite de un nov lingua franca: On refusa continuar payar custosi traductores.
At solmen va esser necessi far uniform grammatica, pronunciation e plu sommun paroles. Ma quande lingues coalesce, li grammatica del resultant lingue es plu simplic e regulari quam ti del coalescent lingues. Li nov lingua franca va esser plu simplic e regulari quam li existent Europan

item.title: Easy WordPress Donations and WooCommerce Ready
item.dc:creator: credev81

item.title: About The Cause
item.dc:creator: credev81
item.content:encoded: The Cause is a clean and elegant non-profit Wordpress theme that can be used for a variety of purposes and causes. From standard non-profit, charity and activism websites, to religious and political organizations The Cause is a must have theme.

item.title: Theme Features
item.dc:creator: credev81
item.content:encoded:
• 6 custom post types
  • 20+ page templates
  • 13 custom widgets
  • 'WooCommerce' ready
  • 'Easy WordPress Donations Plugin' ready
  • 8 Google fonts
  • PSD included
  • Well documented

item.title: Custom Post Types
item.dc:creator: credev81
item.content:encoded:
• Slider
  • FAQ
  • Event
  • Photo
  • Video
  • Testimonial

item.title: Custom Widgets
item.dc:creator: credev81
item.content:encoded:
1. TB About Us - show all about your team or campaign
  2. TB Candidate Bio - show your candidate's biography
  3. TB Categories
  4. TB Connect With Us
  5. TB Contact Details - show your contact details and social network accounts
  6. TB Flickr - show photos from your Flickr account
  7. TB Home Widget
  8. TB Latest Posts - show latest posts with thumbnails
  9. TB Newsletter
  10. TB Popular Posts - show popular posts with thumbnails
  11. TB Sidebar Testimonials - show testimonials in your sidebar
  12. TB Twitter Activity - show your Twitter feed
  13. TB Upcoming Events - show featured events

item.title: Shop and Donations
item.dc:creator: credev81
item.content:encoded:
The Cause WordPress Themeis adjusted to work with two great e-commerce/donations plugins:
  1. WooCommerce Plugin
  2. Easy WordPress Donations Plugin
